010package More_;
011
012import static imagingbook.common.ij.IjUtils.noCurrentImage;
013
014import java.awt.Color;
015import java.awt.geom.Path2D;
016import java.util.Arrays;
017
018import ij.IJ;
019import ij.ImagePlus;
020import ij.gui.GenericDialog;
021import ij.gui.Roi;
022import ij.plugin.filter.PlugInFilter;
023import ij.process.ByteProcessor;
024import ij.process.ImageProcessor;
025import imagingbook.common.geometry.basic.Pnt2d;
026import imagingbook.common.geometry.fd.FourierDescriptor;
027import imagingbook.common.geometry.fd.FourierDescriptorTrigonometric;
028import imagingbook.common.geometry.fd.Utils;
029import imagingbook.common.ij.DialogUtils;
030import imagingbook.common.ij.RoiUtils;
031import imagingbook.common.ij.overlay.ColoredStroke;
032import imagingbook.common.ij.overlay.ShapeOverlayAdapter;
033import imagingbook.common.math.Complex;
034import imagingbook.sampleimages.GeneralSampleImage;
035
036/**
037 * <p>
038 * This ImageJ plugin demonstrates the "trigonometric" construction of elliptic
039 * Fourier descriptors. See Sec. 26.3.7 of [1] for details. The input is a
040 * user-defined polygon selection (ROI). The number of Fourier coefficient pairs
041 * can be specified in the user dialog. The plugin then displays the original polygon
042 * and the approximate contour reconstruction from the Fourier descriptor using
043 * all specified coefficient pairs. Increasing the number of coefficient pairs
044 * improves the reconstruction.
045 * </p>
046 * <p>
047 * [1] W. Burger, M.J. Burge, <em>Digital Image Processing &ndash; An
048 * Algorithmic Introduction Using Java</em>, 2nd ed, Springer (2016).
049 * </p>
050 * 
051 * @author WB
052 * @version 2022/10/28
053 */
054public class Fourier_Descriptor_Trigonometic implements PlugInFilter {
055        
056        private static int FourierCoefficientPairs = 3;
057        
058        // visualization-related settings
059        private static boolean ShowOriginalContour = true;
060        private static boolean ShowFullReconstruction = true;
061        private static int ReconstructionPoints = 100;
062        
063        private static Color ContourColor = new Color(0, 60, 255);
064        private static double ContourStrokeWidth = 0.25;
065        private static Color ReconstructionColor = new Color(0, 185, 15);
066        private static double ReconstructionStrokeWidth = 0.5;
067        
068        private ImagePlus im;
069        
070        // ----------------------------------------------------------------
071        
072        /**
073         * Constructor, asks to open a predefined sample image if no other image
074         * is currently open.
075         */
076        public Fourier_Descriptor_Trigonometic() {
077                if (noCurrentImage()) {
078                        DialogUtils.askForSampleImage(GeneralSampleImage.HouseRoi_tif);
079                }
080        }
081        
082        // ----------------------------------------------------------------
083        
084        @Override
085        public int setup(String arg, ImagePlus im) { 
086        this.im = im;
087        return DOES_ALL + ROI_REQUIRED + NO_CHANGES;
088        }
089        
090        @Override
091        public void run(ImageProcessor ip) {
092                
093                if (!runDialog()) {
094                        return;
095                }
096                
097                Roi anyRoi = im.getRoi();
098                Pnt2d[] V = RoiUtils.getOutlinePointsFloat(anyRoi); // toPointArray(anyRoi);
099                IJ.log("V=" + Arrays.toString(V));
100                FourierDescriptor fd = FourierDescriptorTrigonometric.from(V, FourierCoefficientPairs);
101
102                Complex ctr = fd.getCoefficient(0);
103                
104                ImagePlus imA = makeBackgroundImage();
105                imA.show();
106                
107                ColoredStroke contourStroke = new ColoredStroke(ContourStrokeWidth, ContourColor);
108                ColoredStroke reconstructionStroke = new ColoredStroke(ReconstructionStrokeWidth, ReconstructionColor);
109                
110                ShapeOverlayAdapter ola = new ShapeOverlayAdapter();
111                
112                if (ShowOriginalContour) {
113                        ola.addShape(toClosedPath(V), contourStroke);
114                        ola.addShape(Pnt2d.from(ctr.re, ctr.im).getShape());
115                }
116                
117                if (true) {
118                        for (Pnt2d v : V) {
119                                ola.addShape(v.getShape(3), contourStroke);
120                        }
121                }
122
123                if (ShowFullReconstruction) { // draw the shape reconstructed from all FD-pairs
124                        Path2D rec = Utils.toPath(fd.getShapeFull(ReconstructionPoints));
125                        ola.addShape(rec, reconstructionStroke);
126                }
127
128                imA.setOverlay(ola.getOverlay());
129                imA.updateAndDraw();
130                                
131        }
132
133        // -------------------------------------------------------------
134        
135        private ImagePlus makeBackgroundImage() {
136                ByteProcessor bp = im.getProcessor().convertToByteProcessor();
137                String title = String.format("%s-partial-%03d", im.getShortTitle(), FourierCoefficientPairs);
138                
139                if (bp.isInvertedLut()) {
140                        bp.invert();
141                        bp.invertLut();
142                }
143                brighten(bp, 220);      
144                return new ImagePlus(title, bp);
145        }
146        
147        private Path2D toClosedPath(Pnt2d[] pnts) {
148                Path2D path = new Path2D.Float();
149                path.moveTo(pnts[0].getX(), pnts[0].getY());
150                for (int i = 1; i < pnts.length; i++) {
151                        path.lineTo(pnts[i].getX(), pnts[i].getY());
152                }
153                path.closePath();
154                return path;
155        }
156        
157        private void brighten(ByteProcessor ip, int minGray) {
158                 float scale = (255 - minGray) / 255f;
159                 int[] table = new int[256];
160                 for (int i=0; i<256; i++) {
161                         table[i] = Math.round(minGray + scale * i);
162                         
163                 }
164                 ip.applyTable(table);
165        }
166        
167        // -------------------------------------------------------------
168        
169        private boolean runDialog() {
170                GenericDialog gd = new GenericDialog(this.getClass().getSimpleName());
171                gd.addNumericField("Number of FD pairs (min. 1)", FourierCoefficientPairs, 0);
172                gd.addNumericField("Reconstruction Points", ReconstructionPoints, 0);
173                gd.addCheckbox("Show Original Contour", ShowOriginalContour);
174                gd.addCheckbox("Show Full Reconstruction", ShowFullReconstruction);
175
176                gd.showDialog();
177                if(gd.wasCanceled()) 
178                        return false;
179                
180                FourierCoefficientPairs = Math.max(1, (int) gd.getNextNumber());
181                ReconstructionPoints = (int) gd.getNextNumber();
182                ShowOriginalContour = gd.getNextBoolean();
183                ShowFullReconstruction = gd.getNextBoolean();
184                return true;
185        }
186        
187}
